oai_dc:dc.dc:title: National Boulevard on Missionary Ridge, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of National Boulevard on Missionary Ridge in Chattanooga, Tennessee. A carriage can be seen going down the road and a tower is visible in the distance. Features a white border, divided back, and handwritten correspondence on reverse. July 1915 postmark. [No. 6302]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Missionary Ridge (Tenn. and Ga.); Chattanooga (Tenn.); Hamilton County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Roads; Towers; Mountains; Trees
